author: FireAndRescueAcademy
description: Alliance leaderboard system for Missionchief USA. Displays daily and monthly top 10 rankings for earned credits and treasury contributions with position tracking.
install_msg: Thanks for installing Leaderboard! Use `[p]leaderboard settings` to configure channels. The leaderboards will automatically post daily at 06:00 Amsterdam time and monthly on the last day of each month.
short: Alliance leaderboard system with daily/monthly top 10 rankings
name: Leaderboard
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data. It only reads data from the AllianceScraper database.
